Description: National Agricultural Development Co (known as: Nadec) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Nadec operates within the Food, Beverage and Tobacco sector focusing on Agricultural Products. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia. Nadec is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in June 1981.

Shareholder Name: Abdullah Abdul Aziz Saleh Al Rajhi
Fahd Bin Thiyniyan Bin Fahd Al Thiyniyan
Anwar Abdul Wahab Abdul Hadi Mohamed
